answers.answer: Hello Dear,No specific neurologic signs or symptoms are related to the mycotoin except for mild ataxia, which accompanies systemic intoxication.You should get a second opinion as there could be some other cause such as diabetes,thyroid related,nutritional neuropathy. etcYou can take vitamin b supplementation to prevent the demyleination of nervesRefer http://www.emedicine.com/emerg/topic890.htmBest

question: can neuropathy be caused by mycotoxin?  i have a peripheral neuropathy which caused numbness feeling in my hands and feet for sometime now.  My doctoc gave me meloxicam (mobic) and dolo-neurobion for medication.
title: Neuropathy caused by mycotoxin
